sentences.sentence: The Toot-O-Matic project started with several design goals
sentences.translation: Toot-O-Matic 项目是从以下几个设计目标开始的

sentences.sentence: The Toot-O-Matic also generates a feedback panel automatically.
sentences.translation: Toot-O-Matic 会自动生成 feedback 面板。

sentences.sentence: All of the formatting and layout issues in the PDF files are handled by the Toot-O-Matic.
sentences.translation: PD F文件中的所有格式和布局问题都是由Toot - o - Matic处理的。
